app.name: WUP Downloader
app.short_description: Download content from the NUS on the WiiU
app.long_description:
This app is made for downloading installable content from the NUS directly onto the WiiU SD Card. If a ticket isn't found on the NUS, you can create fake ones (title.tik) at the start of a download, or in the main menu Please, don't do piracy with this app (Only download games that you had bought)
Releases: https://github.com/Pokes303/WUPDownloader/releases Source code: https://github.com/Pokes303/WUPDownloader
